cause.description:
In Nicaragua, there are girls as young as 10, 12 years old who are pregnant. A great deal of these pregnancies result from rape...either by a stranger or by the girls' own family members.
21% of all newborn children have adolescents as their mothers (Proyecto Dos Generaciones 1996), partly due to near inexistant sexual education.
The purpose of the Nicaraguan Women & Children's Fund is to help educate these young girls on how to care for themselves while pregnant and how to care for the babies after they are born.
The women & children are educated about personal hygeine and helped to create maternity clothing to be worn during the pregnancies, baby clothes, socks, baby blankets, carriers, etc.
Please donate what you can--you will be surprised what $10 can do for these families.
1. We must help educate these women & children.
cause.mission: Educate & provide necessities for Nicaraguan women & children.
cause.name: Nicaraguan Women & Children's Fund
